titleStmt.title: An Act of Common Council for the Better Regulation of Weighing of Goods and Merchandizes at the King's Beam
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).

notesStmt.note: "The oath of every free-man of the city of London, upon his admission into the freedom thereof"--P. [1] at end.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
